article.title: VSE Receives Award for Army Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: VSE Corporation's Federal Group Communications & Engineering and Field Support Services divisions were awarded a task order for U.S. Army Support Services. The task order could be worth up to $389 million if the task order option period is exercised. Under the order, VSE will provide technical support services, including program management, integrated logistics, repair, maintenance and sustainment of route and area clearance countermine/counter-improvised explosive device vehicular systems, on behalf of the U.S. Army Program Executive Office Combat Support and Combat Service Support systems, Product Manager for Assured Mobility Systems.
